Introduction
This topic contains general information on reducing pension awards under 38 CFR 3.551 and 3.556, including
criteria for reducing pension of a hospitalized Veteran
reducing current-law and Section 306 Pension for inpatient care at Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) expense
benefits not subject to reduction under 38 CFR 3.551
electing the greater benefit of pension or compensation
screening Compensation and Pension Records Interchange (CAPRI) reports to determine if adjustment is required
due process and controls for hospital adjustments
adjusting pension awards for hospitalization in the award processing system
provisions of
Public Law (PL) 102-568
for current-law pension
adjusting awards involving additional allowance for aid and attendance (A&A)
adjusting pension of incompetent Veterans
, and
cases involving entitlement to military retired pay (MRP)
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Adjusting Pension Under 38 CFR 3.551 and 3.556
citation: Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
